title: I think Riot has a concussion
body:
And their balance team can't remember what a nerf is or what a buff is so they got them confused

Remember a while back, when they said that they were going to nerf Lucian, and they ended up giving him a manaless dash that got its CD lowered when he used his passive?  Ya, that was actually a buff

Remember when they said that they would bring Zed into line by nerfing him.  And then they took away a tiny bit of AS.  I really don't even call that a nerf after 5 years of watching champs get dismantled by the nerfbat

Remember they said that they were opening up the jungle?  And then they closed it to everyone except 3-4 champs.  And they keep nerfing everything EXCEPT those champs while saying they are trying to buff other junglers.

And now, after DFG got taken out of the game, a clear nerf to Veigar and Morde, they talk about giving them buffs to make up for the loss.

And they change morde so he deals way less burst damage and has to build tanky to get his shield.  Yet he still has no CC and no mobility, so its not going to change anything.  He will still be as kitable as ever, and deal less damage if he ever gets to his target.  Even less because now he doesn't even build damage, yet has no % health on his kit except for his ult.  This is a straight-up nerf.

Or how they are changing Veigar:  TAKING damage from his ult and having a delay on his E.  And saying he can farm more to make up for it, yet increasing CD on his Q.  As if it wasn't hard enough already to land a veigar E.  This is a nerf, yet they have the balls to call it a buff

Rito, you have nerf and buff confused.  Pls fix yourself

But they never said it was a buff. You know, I said the exact same thing about {{champion:103}} during 5.1

Think about that for a moment.

Ahri got  a giant MS boost on a 4 second cooldown late game and she now deals damage without needing to land her charm. Those were buffs.

Morde got everything on his spells nerfed and Veigar now only has 2 spells, nerfs

Remember when they actually went through with it and nerfed Lucian? Of course you don't.
You know how every Zed just split pushed 24/7 post laning phase so maybe the nerf was a good start that would't completely destroy him? Nope
You know how Morde never ever burst anyone down anyway unless he was 20/0? Maybe focusing on his identity as tank more than as a useless mage could be a good idea? You know how he's dominating PBE? Nooope

The white lies about the Veigar changes are so stupidly dishonest that I'll stop with the rhetorical questions. Yeah they're reducing the *ratio* (1.2 -> 1.0) from his ult, the damage remains the same and the cooldown and mana cost are reduced. Oh no! Now D-Cap rush Veigar is useless... which it was anyway.
His E was impossible to hit anyway unless {{summoner:4}} or {{item:3117}} (this was, incidentally, the strategy that high level Veigar players had going for them, *much diversity*) and they're increasing its range and reducing the mana cost and cooldown (hint, hint this is a trend). Now it's the zoning tool that it was against competent players. EDIT: If he played like standard mage, I mean.
His Q gets the exact same treatment, except it has a higher CD post rank 3 (by .5/1 second, mind you) and now is a skill shot which stops at the 2nd target hit. Considering that his W *also* got CDR and mana buffs, yes this is a buff to his farming phase. 

But by all means, keep cherry picking from the changes you don't like to make them look like a nerf.

*sigh*

>Remember a while back, when they said that they were going to nerf Lucian, and they ended up giving him a manaless dash that got its CD lowered when he used his passive? Ya, that was actually a buff

Riot clearly called it a redefining of strengths.  They didn't say they were nerfing him, simply tuning his strengths and weak points.  Was the tuning too minor to make a huge difference, yes.  Also note, prior to the retuning, his dash had similar mana costs to what it has now, including being free at max rank.

>Remember when they said that they would bring Zed into line by nerfing him. And then they took away a tiny bit of AS. I really don't even call that a nerf after 5 years of watching champs get dismantled by the nerfbat

The nerf was aimed at his split pushing and tower crushing, which did take a decided hit, not enough of one imo but it did take a hit.  If you were expecting the word nerf to always turn a champ into Olaf, then you need to redefine your use of the word.

>Remember they said that they were opening up the jungle? And then they closed it to everyone except 3-4 champs. And they keep nerfing everything EXCEPT those champs while saying they are trying to buff other junglers.

Kinda funny, I've seen more champs in the jungle these days and a lot less of {{champion:254}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:64}} the holy mother f*#$ing trinity of the jungle from seasons prior.  Every ranked game last season was one of those three.  EVERY SINGLE ONE.  Is the jungle harder, heck yeah.  Do you have to make harder decisions and bite the bullet more, heck yes.  Does it open up some diversity in the jungle?  Sweet blissful Morde YES!

>And they change morde-

*sigh* Because obviously you can only build him glass cannon or tank, no one can ever build him AP bruiser.

>Or how they are changing Veigar

His numbers need tweaking, but I like where they are going.  The added range makes him a little safer in lane, a little.  I'd like to see a little more tuning done, maybe amp up the AP he can get just a little?  Increase the width of the stun line on his E and maybe a touch more base mana.  They are taking care of some old issues he had, hopefully they will tune him up slightly, I don't want to have to wait til late game before I start hurting people.

4) Veigar doesn't need to wait till late game to hurt people right now, what type of useless build are you doing that you need to wait until late game to dish damage? Veigar will need more than numbers tuning in order to be even remotely close to being as useful as he is now and he isn't that great now so that should tell you something
